name: War Of Deadly Zombies
description:
In War Of Deadly Zombies game use Heavy weapons to trigger deadly overkill of undead zombies in a tsunami wave of walking dead. Deadly monsters are swarming in old horror houses, all the rooms are crippling with fear & thrill, zombies are in rage, chances of survival are bleak, so time has come to pick your shooting weapon and shoot all these deadly monsters and clear this land , strike a deadly attack to counter the incoming wave of these zombies target.


War Of Deadly Zombies: Features

Superb & High definition 3D Graphics
Zombies Wave shooting
Different Guns to choose
Free to Play
Filled with Action
